com.sap.vocabularies.EnterpriseSearchHan.@Core.Description#Published: 2018-01-31 Â© Copyright 2018 SAP SE. All rights reserved

arbitraryCardinality.@Core.Description: Defines a column as a multi-value column.
arbitraryCardinality.@Core.LongDescription: This means that the column comes from an 1:n join and that it is returned in the search result as an array. This annotation is only allowed for columns that are of a SQL type that can be used in a group by clause.

weight.@Core.Description: Defines the ranking weight of a column that is used to calculate the overall score.
weight.@Core.LongDescription: Only one of the annotations @EnterpriseSearchHana.weight and @Search.ranking can be used for a column.

identifier.@Core.Description: Defines the OData identifier of a column. The value has to be a valid OData identifier.
identifier.@Core.LongDescription: If an identifier is defined, the identifier is used instead of the original column name in all interfaces of esh_search() including the metadata call. In other words, the internal column name is not visible to the users of esh_search(). If this annotation is not given, the column name is used as an identifier.

numc.@Core.Description: Defines a column as an ABAP NUMC column (a numeric value padded with leading zeros).
numc.@Core.LongDescription: Without score functions, a search in a NUMC column is done similar to an alphanum search limited to numeric characters.Interval facets are returned, if a facet is requested for a NUMC column.

layoutStructuredObject.@Core.Description: Defines a subobject of the anchor object
layoutStructuredObject.@Core.LongDescription: This means that the columns of the subobject come from a 1:n join and are returned in the search result as an array.

arbitraryCardinality.@Core.Description: defines that the subobject comes from a 1:n join and that there may be multiple subobject instances for a given anchor object.

layerId.@Core.Description: Defines the name of the subobject.

childIds.@Core.Description: Defines the names of other subobjects that are included within the subobject.

defaultExpand.@Core.Description: defines which subobjects are returned in the search result.

elementList.@Core.Description: Defines the view columns that belong to the subobject.

DefaultExpandType.WHY_FOUND@Core.Description: Only the subobject of the anchor object are returned that contain at least one of the search terms.
DefaultExpandType.ALL@Core.Description: All subobjects of an anchor object are returned.

element.@Core.Description: Contains the name of a view column that belongs to the subobject.

key.@Core.Description: Defines if a column is part of the subobject's key. Used to identify the distinct subobjects of an anchor object.
key.@Core.LongDescription: If there are no key columns defined for a subobject, all columns are used to identify the distinct subobjects.

bundle.@Core.Description: Defines the name of a resource bundle. Can be used by the search ui to load a view label.

key.@Core.Description: defines the name of a key in a resource bundle. Can be used by the search ui to load a view label.

translation.@Core.Description: Defines multilingual UI text directly in the search configuration as an alternative to resource bundles. The texts are returned in the output of a metadata call.

TranslationType.@Core.Description: Placeholder that is later used in the search configuration to reference the translated texts.

language.@Core.Description: Language code with location, IE: en_GB, en_US, en_AU, de_DE, de_AT.
